name: Vote Stay
description:
A blend of the old and new site styles with a lot of minor tweaks to things that bug me.

Uses much of the old color scheme and layout, keeps the top bar always visible, and has a crude implementation of a moving right-side nav bar section to allow full site navigation below the minimum width.

Note: Intended to be used in conjunction with uBlock Origin. This has not been tested without it so results may vary.
additional_info:
This still works fine, but after about a year of quick fixes and throwing lines in unorganized, it needs a code/structure cleanup pass and more commenting added into it so others can modify/take from it as they please. I'm waiting until the new layout comes out of beta to do this as that's going to require a ton of work to 'correct' the changes.

Recent changes:
(July 2017)
- Hide native advertising for Mike's Hard Lemonade (removes post tag in gallery and on submission, gif button, and pop-up nag when submitting new posts)
- Fixed change in comment cancelling button to prevent overlap with remaining character count.
Changed 
- Shrunk and muted gallery tag posts to reduce blank space and no longer look like someone puked Chef Boyardee next to the upvote/downvote buttons.
